original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2601)@</color>武將前衝挑斬激起一股衝擊波，攻擊前方敵人，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2601)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2601)@</color>The general rushed forward and slashed a shock wave, attacking the enemy in front, with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2601)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy.
